<MethodEndpoint

Retrieves detailed information about a Mina NFT V2.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"contractAddress":{"type":"string","description":"Always set to this contract address for Mina NFTs."},"nftAddress":{"type":"string","description":"The unique NFT address."}},"required":["contractAddress","nftAddress"],"title":"NFTRequestParams"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
